body_html:
@terribilissimo Check if python.exe is the one that lies in c:\users\poko\anaconda2\envs\fastai, and c:\users\poko\anaconda2\envs\fastai\Library exists in PATH after you activate the env.
Just use the commands below.

activate fastai
where python
echo %PATH%
body_text:
@terribilissimo Check if python.exe is the one that lies in c:\users\poko\anaconda2\envs\fastai, and c:\users\poko\anaconda2\envs\fastai\Library exists in PATH after you activate the env.
Just use the commands below.
activate fastai
where python
echo %PATH%
body:
@terribilissimo Check if `python.exe` is the one that lies in `c:\users\poko\anaconda2\envs\fastai`, and `c:\users\poko\anaconda2\envs\fastai\Library` exists in PATH after you activate the env.
Just use the commands below.
```CMD
activate fastai
where python
echo %PATH%
```
